title: Blood Lust & Voodoo Dust
description: Sex, Voodoo and Vampires in New Orleans.Holy wet panties, you'll laugh and need a change of underwear by the time you're done here.Shae is a concupiscent Vampire living on an old New Orleans plantation when he falls for the trouble making, Voodoo practicing, girl of his dreams.
author: J.C. Fay
